ddue:summary.ddue:para: This namespace contains elements and types that are used to document an XML schema.

ddue:alert.ddue:para: This is an early release of AppName. The namespace http://tempuri.org/XMLSchema.xsd does reflect this. The final namespace will be something like http://schemas.xyz.codeplex.com/schemaDoc, xyz being the released project name.

ddue:summary.ddue:para: This schema contains all elements and types that are used to document an XML schema.
This element can be used within the appinfo element of a schema to add MAML content to a schema item.
This element can be used to create links to XML entities, such as elements, attributes, groups or types.

ddue:content.ddue:para: For details on how to create links see

ddue:summary.ddue:para: This element is the root element of an external documentation file.
This element declares the namespace all the doc members in this file are associated with.
This element contains the name of the namespace all the doc members in this file are associated with.
This element contains the items to be documented.
This element contains the documentation of an XML schema item.

ddue:content.ddue:para: For details on how to externally document members, see .

ddue:summary.ddue:para: This attribute contains the URI of the XML schema item being documented.

ddue:content.ddue:para: For details on the link URI scheme, see .

ddue:summary.ddue:para: This type describes the possible elements to document XML schemas either inline or via an external documentation file.
This type describes the valid values of an XML schema item URI.

ddue:content.ddue:para: For details on the link URI scheme, see .

ddue:summary.ddue:para: This type describes the valid values of a namespace in the external documentation file.

ddue:content.ddue:para: For details on the link URI scheme, see .

ddue:summary.ddue:para: This type describes the valid values of a member URI used in the external documentation file.

ddue:content.ddue:para: For details on the link URI scheme, see .
